review: Not very heavy at all.  We are in January and this is the second one I have bought my 4th grader this year.  It should've been bought in Nov but I tried to hold off until the second semester.  Wilson Jones, any I buy last a month or two and a new one is needed.  Not a good buy.
productTitle: Wilson Jones Heavy Duty Round Ring View Binder with Extra Durable Hinge, 2 Inch, Customizable, Light Blue (W363-44-2925)
